properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Nearer, my God to thee,
nearer to thee!
E'ven though it be a cross
that raiseth me,
still all my song shall be,
nearer, my God to thee!
Nearer my God to thee!
Near to thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Though like the wanderer,
the sun gone down,
darkens be over me,
my rest a stone,
yet in my dreams
I'd be nearer, my God to thee,
nearer, my God to thee,
nearer to thee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
There let the way appear,
steps unto Heav'n,
all that thou sendest me,
in mercy given.
Angels to beckon me nearer,
my God to thee, nearer,
my God to thee nearer to thee.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Then, with my walking thought
bright with thy praise,
out of my stony grief,
Bethel I'll raise,
so by my woes be,
nearer my God to thee,
nearer my God to thee,
nearer to thee.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Or, if on joyful wing
cleaving the sky,
sun moon, and stars forgot,
upward i'll fly,
still all my song shall be,
nearer my God to thee,
nearer my God to thee,
nearer to thee.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
There in my father's home,
safe and at rest,
there in my saviour's love,
perfectly blest,
age after age to be,
nearer my God to thee,
nearer my God to thee,
nearer to thee.
